definitions.definition: To pinch and pull with a sudden jerk and twist; to twitch .

examples: If we tweak the colors towards blue, it will look more natural.

definitions.definition: To tease , to annoy ; to get under the skin of (someone, typically so as to irritate them, or by extension to enamor , frighten , etc).
To abuse methamphetamines , especially crystal meth .
To exhibit extreme nervousness, evasiveness when confronted by authorities, compulsiveness, erratic motion, excitability, etc, due to or mimicking the symptoms of methamphetamine abuse.
To be extremely confused ; to have no clue what is happening .
examples: Am I tweaking or does 2020 feel like 6 months ago?

definitions.definition: From a catapult , to strike a target with a missile .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To pinch and pull with a sudden jerk and twist; to twitch .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , informal ) To adjust slightly; to fine-tune .
( transitive ) To tease , to annoy ; to get under the skin of (someone, typically so as to irritate them, or by extension to enamor , frighten , etc).
( intransitive , US , slang ) To abuse methamphetamines , especially crystal meth .

( intransitive , US , slang ) To exhibit extreme nervousness, evasiveness when confronted by authorities, compulsiveness, erratic motion, excitability, etc, due to or mimicking the symptoms of methamphetamine abuse.
( intransitive , slang , by extension ) To be extremely confused ; to have no clue what is happening .
( military , weaponry , uncommon ) From a catapult , to strike a target with a missile .
